description.value: This Extension resource is constrained to support a code value to support the fasting status of the patient at the time the specimen was collected.

short.value: A coded value of the fasting status when the specimen was collected.

definition.value: A coded value of the fasting status when the specimen was collected.

short.value: A coded value that inidcates the fasting status of the patient at the time the sample was collected.

definition.value: A coded value that inidcates the fasting status of the patient at the time the sample was collected.
